dmca.title: Police du Net DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

works.description:
Abuse Report - Copyright
Object: Link redirecting to illegal copyright content

Link:
https://musicore.net/forums/index.php?/topic/752390-michel-fugain-bon-an-mal-an-deluxe-edition-2cd-fr-2012-ss4b/
http://telechargersonic101.net/musique/25479-michel_fugain__bon_an_mal_an_2012_multi.html
http://www.libertyland.tv/liberte/286948-michel-fugain-bon-an-mal-an-printemps-ete-automne-hiver.html
http://www.telecharger-tout.com/musiques/pop_rock/276320-rg-michel-fugain-bon-an-mal-an-deluxe-edition-2012.html
http://www.indirmix.net/ses-ve-muzik/print:page,1,55897-michel-fugain-bon-an-mal-an-2012.html
http://www.smartorrent.com/?page=torrentinfo&tid=218318&language=en
http://rapidsharemp3.com/mp3-download/67208/michel_fugain_bon_an_mal_an_deluxe_edition/
http://www.fluket.com/michel-fugain-bon-an-mal-an-l-ete-2011-320kbps-megaupload/p493889/
http://www.movizdl.com/musique/pop/74557-Michel%20Fugain%20-%20Bon%20An%20Mal%20An%20%28Deluxe%20Edition%29%20%282012%29%20%5BTB%5D.html
http://www.legalsounds.com/download-mp3/michel-fugain/bon-an-mal-an/la-sir%C3%A8ne/song_5492991
http://www.legalsounds.com/download-mp3/michel-fugain/bon-an-mal-an/attention-!/song_5492989
http://www.filesdrop.com/depositfiles-michel-fugain-bon-an-mal-an-quot-le-printemps-quot-2011/t235499/
http://www.smartorrent.com/?page=torrentinfo&tid=241895&comment=10&language=en
http://www.smartorrent.com/?page=torrentinfo&tid=241895&comment=10

The registered French office Police du net and its legal representative Jessica Gagnon , Agent of Police du net.
We have noticed that some of our client product is available without our prior authorization. 
It concerns the following album :

Détails
Artist :Michel Fuguain 
Album:Bon an mal an
Copyright: Distribution Select
Agent Authorize: Police Du Net

In these circumstances, we ask you to remove and to ban any search queries that may contain links concerning this album in agreement with your DMCA policy.

I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, (If you need the document approval reply me with your email and i will send it to you)

I have a good faith belief that use of the aforementioned material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thanks for your comprehension and the artist work
Best regards,
Jessica Gagnon
survey@policedunet.com
Police Du Net,
281 de la réserve
Quebec,Ca
G7J 3N3
418.550.3812
